txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Squishy goo from the insects and spiders in Ered Luin. Collect them and deliver them to Dorri at Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
'Yes, this is squishy and a bit sticky...it should do nicely.\n\n'Your efforts will echo through the halls.'
'Whether you choose to believe this or not, the goo that you sometimes find from spiders and insects can be combined with their filth to make a strong, if pungent, binding agent.'
Dorri wants squishy goo. Dorri can be found standing at the west gate of Gondamon.
Deliver the squishy goo to Dorri at Gondamon
You have accepted a task to acquire squishy goo. You are to deliver them to Dorri at the western gate of Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
Wanted: Squishy goo from the insects and spiders in Ered Luin.
